title: Vittu Vittu Olikkudhu Lyrics Inayathalam
stanzas:
Vittu vittu olikkudhu
veenai naadham.
thottu thottu pazhagattum
thoadi raagam.

etti etti nadappathenna
niyaayam.
minni minni maraiyum
vaarthai vendum.

Vittu vittu olikkudhu
veenai naadham.
thottu thottu pazhagattum
thoadi raagam.

en tholil nee thoongum
neram ennodu
uchcham thodu.

Vittu vittu olikkudhu
veenai naadham.
thottu thottu pazhagattum
thoadi raagam.

etti etti nadappathenna
niyaayam.
minni minni maraiyum
vaarthai vendum.
